subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Carmelo Anthony opened Team U.S.A.’s training camp for the World Championships hoping to reverse the team’s fortunes at the 2004 Olympics.
snippet: LeBron James, Dwyane Wade and Carmelo Anthony opened Team U.S.A.’s training camp for the World Championships hoping to reverse the team’s fortunes at the 2004 Olympics.
